analysis.description: CardMakerCake.isContract (/unique_chucks/35/0xeaf2f814a946280cd7d77656726ec17d2dff096e.sol#384-387) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/35/0xeaf2f814a946280cd7d77656726ec17d2dff096e.sol:
	Contract CardMakerCake has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/35/0xeaf2f814a946280cd7d77656726ec17d2dff096e.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
empty in CardMakerCake.transfer (/unique_chucks/35/0xeaf2f814a946280cd7d77656726ec17d2dff096e.sol#377-378) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in CardMakerCake.transferToContract (/unique_chucks/35/0xeaf2f814a946280cd7d77656726ec17d2dff096e.sol):
	External calls:
	- (price,owner) = receiver.doTransfer(msg.sender,bytesToUint(_data)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xeaf2f814a946280cd7d77656726ec17d2dff096e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/35/0xeaf2f814a946280cd7d77656726ec17d2dff096e.sol)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/35/0xeaf2f814a946280cd7d77656726ec17d2dff096e.sol)
